scripts.bootstrap: npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-frontend build && npm run with-env -- npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk bootstrap
scripts.docker:build: npm run with-env -- docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t $HUB_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO_REGION.amazonaws.com/$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO:latest ./source/infrastructure/lib/components/account-cleaner
scripts.docker:login: npm run with-env -- "aws ecr get-login-password --region $PRIVATE_ECR_REPO_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $HUB_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO_REGION.amazonaws.com"
scripts.docker:build-and-push: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:login && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:frontend:build: npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-frontend build && npm run with-env -- docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t $HUB_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO_REGION.amazonaws.com/$PRIVATE_ECR_FRONTEND_REPO:latest ./source/frontend
scripts.docker:frontend:build-and-push: npm run docker:frontend:build && npm run docker:login && npm run docker:frontend:push
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:account-pool && npm run deploy:idc && npm run deploy:data && npm run deploy:compute
scripts.deploy:account-pool: npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk synth && npm run with-env npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk deploy -- InnovationSandbox-AccountPool --require-approval=never --parameters ParentOuId=$PARENT_OU_ID --parameters HubAccountId=$HUB_ACCOUNT_ID --context deploymentMode=$DEPLOYMENT_MODE --parameters IsbManagedRegions=$AWS_REGIONS
scripts.deploy:idc: npm run with-env npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk deploy -- InnovationSandbox-IDC --require-approval=never --parameters IdentityStoreId=$IDENTITY_STORE_ID --parameters SsoInstanceArn=$SSO_INSTANCE_ARN --parameters HubAccountId=$HUB_ACCOUNT_ID --parameters AdminGroupName=$ADMIN_GROUP_NAME --parameters ManagerGroupName=$MANAGER_GROUP_NAME --parameters UserGroupName=$USER_GROUP_NAME
scripts.deploy:data: npm run with-env npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk deploy -- InnovationSandbox-Data --require-approval=never --context deploymentMode=$DEPLOYMENT_MODE --context nukeConfigFilePath=$NUKE_CONFIG_FILE_PATH
scripts.deploy:compute: npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-frontend build && npm run with-env npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk deploy -- InnovationSandbox-Compute --require-approval=never --parameters OrgMgtAccountId=$ORG_MGT_ACCOUNT_ID --parameters IdcAccountId=$IDC_ACCOUNT_ID --parameters AcceptSolutionTermsOfUse=$ACCEPT_SOLUTION_TERMS_OF_USE --context deploymentMode=$DEPLOYMENT_MODE --context privateEcrRepo=$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO --context isGovCloud=$IS_GOVCLOUD
scripts.deploy:container: npm run with-env npm run --workspace @amzn/innovation-sandbox-infrastructure cdk deploy -- InnovationSandbox-Container --require-approval=never --parameters PrivateEcrRepo=$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO --parameters PrivateEcrRepoRegion=$PRIVATE_ECR_REPO_REGION --parameters PrivateEcrFrontendRepo=$PRIVATE_ECR_FRONTEND_REPO --parameters RestApiUrl=$REST_API_URL --parameters AllowListedIPRanges=$ALLOWED_IP_RANGES --parameters VpcCidr=$VPC_CIDR --context deploymentMode=$DEPLOYMENT_MODE
scripts.destroy:all: npm run destroy:container && npm run destroy:compute && npm run destroy:data && npm run destroy:idc && npm run destroy:account-pool
